boardgame.name: Nemesis
boardgame.description: Nemesis is a 1-5 player survival sci-fi game where players are woken up from hibernation as a crew of a space ship. The emergency procedure states that there is a critical system failure and the space ship can't continue its cruise. The goal of the crew is to find what is causing this failure and fix the situation to safely return back to Earth. The main problem is that one crew member is dead. Somebody crashed his hibernation chamber and pulled his body out. In addition, if you listen closely, some additional noises and sounds can be heard. New ones, strange ones, ones that were never heard before_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;hellip;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Nemesis is a cooperation game combined with bluffing, backstabbing, and other elements of a science-fiction survival horror adventure._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Devon Dice Unhinged 4. He’s back... Lewis is not dead!
Just Three Rogues – 002 – The Boxer and the Sexy Auditor

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: The extra that came with the Lords of Hellas KS. In shrink.

*** PREORDER WITH EXPECTED DELIVERY Q4 2018*** Base pledge (includes Voidseeders expansion and aftermath expansion + all stretch goals) + Terrain expansion + Medic. No sundrop. I paid for 2-wave shipping. This means you will get the base game as soon as it is available, rather than having to wait until all the stretch goal content is ready. If you purchase before it ships to me, I will change the address to you, which means shipping is FREE! If you purchase after I am able to change the address (probably a month before it ships), then shipping will be expensive. I will charge exact shipping for the base game, plus an estimate for the stretch goal content (Likely $40-$50 total).

Core box pledge includes: Core box game of Nemesis boardgame: 25 miniatures, 120 cardboard elements, 280 cards, 50 other elements + all unlocked stretch goals: no Mechanic miniature + his hero tray, action cards and starting items - 5th player contamination cards - Co-op mode: - rulebook, hourglass, 5 new primary objectives, 10 character achievements cards - playing as intruder option: rules after character death, intruder player board, 5 intruder objective cards - custom slime markers - custom ammunition tokens - alternative ship layout on the back of the gameboard - 5 special card holders (to hide your equipment) - additional noise and combat dices - Voidseer expansion: 15 miniatures, 60 cards, 20 tokens, other components - Untold stories - gameplay script comic book - 3 turret miniatures and 10 tokens (plus tile) - malfunction and fire tokens upgrade - Spacecat figure - Aftermath expansion: Rulebook, 6 models, 120 cards (final amount may vary a bit), 7 tokens, 18 other elements)

mechanic miniature - mechanic hero tray and starting items - mechanic action cards - 5th player contamination cards FULL CO-OP MODE - co-op rulebook - hourglass - 5 new primary objectives - 10 character achievements cards - story campaign PLAYING AS INTRUDER - rules after character death - intruder player board - 5 intruder objective cards QUALITY UPGRADES - custom slime markers - custom ammunition tokens - individual action cards illustrations for each character (over 40 new illustrations) - individual alien attach illustrations (18 new illustrations) - alternative ship layout (on the back of the gameboard) - 5 special card holders (to hide your equipment) - additional noise dice - additional combat dice - alternative intruder pose 1 - alternative intruder pose 2 - alternative intruder pose 3 VOIDSEEDERS EXPANSION BOX - stretch goals box - voidseeder despoiler miniature - voidseeder rulebook - 20 voidseeder attack cards - 20 voidseeder event cards - 6 void lurkers - voidseeder_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s tray - 2 new combat dices - 4 whisperers - 20 insanity tokens - 20 insanity cards - stalker miniature - 3 nest miniatures UNTOLD STORIES - gameplay script comic book with 20 pages VARIETY UPGRADES - additional 1 starting item to choose from for core crew - airlock (new cardboard room tile) - 3 turret miniatures - 10 turret tokens - turret room tile - plastic fire tokens upgrade - plastic malfunction tokens upgrade - plastic fire tokens upgrade - plastic malfunction tokens upgrade - spacecat special figure AFTERMATH EXPANSION BOX - 7 nemesis crew tokens - 15 new aftermath secret objective cards - android miniature - android hero tray and starting items - android action cards - aftermath rulebook - therapist miniature - therapist hero tray and starting items - therapist action cards - 10 crew encounter cards - docked ship (additional game board) - convict miniature - convict hero tray and starting items - convict action cards - bounty hunter miniature - bounty hunter hero tray and starting items - bounty hunter action cards - executive miniature - executive hero tray and starting items - executive action cards

This is the core box + the the special kickstarter bonus pack which includes the Untold Stories book, and an extra counter sheet. There is also some promotional material from Tainted Grail. I will include the 2nd waive of kickstarter with the stretch goals when it arrives here in Barcelona - it seems will be this quarter. The box is open and the components as well. Never played the game. The inner box is slightly open on the top, but is not visible once you close the box. Game is essentially as new. I can ship now the core game and extras which allow you to start playing the game and do a 2nd shipment of the rest when it arrives.

PRESALE: The game will not be available until sometime in April to June 2019 (manufacture estimate) What you are buying: Nemesis Board Game Core Game (Awaken Realms) All Kickstarter Stretch Goals Medic Character Pack (Kickstarter Exclusive Add-On) English Language NOT Sundrop Pledge I will keep you posted on delivery updates as I get them from Awaken Realms and of course when the game is on its way to you. I have positive feed back on BGG Market Place and an established positive history with eBay (I can send my handle if requested.) Buyer to pay upfront estimated shipping costs, that includes signature/proof of delivery, from Washington, DC 20003 zip code. Minimum shipping charged will $20. Potential weight of everything will be in neighborhood of 18lbs to 20lbs! 18lbs with a box size of 13x13x13 is being used to make my base shipping estimates. UPS, FedEx, or USPS will be used whichever you prefer and/or is cheapest. Using the UPS zone/rate chart it appears that shipping estimates are from $20 to $46 depending on your zone from the 20003 zip code. At time of delivery when actual shipping prices will be known. I will refund or request additional charges of sums greater that $3 dollars. US shipping ONLY Local pick up available (and preferred) Email questions before purchasing

1ST WAVE IN HAND. Brand New REGULAR CORE pledge for Nemesis by Awaken Realms. Will include core game and stretch goals. See below for full list. What i have IN HAND is the base game so you can play NOW and some of the little teaser gifts from Awaken Realms. PRESALE. Presale means that i do not have all the contents shipped to me yet. Apparently there has been some confusion here so i apologize if i am being overly clear :). I can ship in a single wave when everything is delivered. This will be the cheaper option. Due to wanting to have the game faster for my buyers, I paid extra to receive a first wave ahead of time. 2 wave shipping always costs more than 1 wave so PLEASE NOTE that the 2 wave option will be more than $35. I have ran costs through Fedex, UPS, and USPS and it seems that the 2 wave option will cost $20-$30 more. There is a ton of content still coming in wave 2 so i wont know exactly what we are looking at until it comes. Kickstarter delays are likely. Will ship first come first serve. Included is as follows: Core box game of Nemesis boardgame: 25 miniatures, 120 cardboard elements, 280 cards, 50 other elements + all unlocked stretch goals: - Mechanic miniature + his hero tray, action cards and starting items - 5th player contamination cards - Co-op mode: - rulebook, hourglass, 5 new primary objectives, 10 character achievements cards - playing as intruder option: rules after character death, intruder player board, 5 intruder objective cards - custom slime markers - custom ammunition tokens - alternative ship layout on the back of the gameboard - 5 special card holders (to hide your equipment) - additional noise and combat dices - Voidseer expansion: 15 miniatures, 60 cards, 20 tokens, other components - Untold stories - gameplay script comic book - 3 turret miniatures and 10 tokens (plus tile) - malfunction and fire tokens upgrade - Spacecat figure - Aftermath expansion: Rulebook, 6 models, 120 cards (final amount may vary a bit), 7 tokens, 18 other elements As far as payment goes I would strongly prefer Zelle, Chase Pay, or even personal check. If you have any questions on this please let me know!

Insurance can be added to package at buyers request and extra expense. US shipping ONLY My shipping time is of course subject to manufactures shipping times which potentially are subject to change. 1ST WAVE IN HAND. Brand New REGULAR CORE pledge for Nemesis by Awaken Realms. Will include core game and stretch goals. See below for full list. What i have IN HAND is the base game so you can play NOW and some of the little teaser gifts from Awaken Realms. PRESALE. Presale means that i do not have all the contents shipped to me yet. Apparently there has been some confusion here so i apologize if i am being overly clear :). I can ship in a single wave when everything is delivered. This will be the cheaper option. Due to wanting to have the game faster for my buyers, I paid extra to receive a first wave ahead of time. 2 wave shipping always costs more than 1 wave so PLEASE NOTE that the 2 wave option will be more than $35. I have ran costs through Fedex, UPS, and USPS and it seems that the 2 wave option will cost $20-$30 more. There is a ton of content still coming in wave 2 so i wont know exactly what we are looking at until it comes. Kickstarter delays are likely. Will ship first come first serve. Included is as follows: Core box game of Nemesis boardgame: 25 miniatures, 120 cardboard elements, 280 cards, 50 other elements + all unlocked stretch goals: - Mechanic miniature + his hero tray, action cards and starting items - 5th player contamination cards - Co-op mode: - rulebook, hourglass, 5 new primary objectives, 10 character achievements cards - playing as intruder option: rules after character death, intruder player board, 5 intruder objective cards - custom slime markers - custom ammunition tokens - alternative ship layout on the back of the gameboard - 5 special card holders (to hide your equipment) - additional noise and combat dices - Voidseer expansion: 15 miniatures, 60 cards, 20 tokens, other components - Untold stories - gameplay script comic book - 3 turret miniatures and 10 tokens (plus tile) - malfunction and fire tokens upgrade - Spacecat figure - Aftermath expansion: Rulebook, 6 models, 120 cards (final amount may vary a bit), 7 tokens, 18 other elements As far as payment goes I would strongly prefer Zelle, Chase Pay, or even personal check. If you have any questions on this please let me know!

Used Kickstarter Wave 1 - - I bought used and then used it more myself! Great Game!! (Now this game feels like the movie _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Aliens_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;!) I am now selling this in anticipation of mine arriving! A few of the cards are worn, just a bit on the edges, should not effect the game at all. Trying to provide more info for all of those folks asking...Core Box + Wave 1 Stretch Goals (see below) The following are all of the Wave 1 Stretch Goals that I received (that I am aware of....reference my pics): *6th Character - Mechanic; Action Cards + Hero Tray + Starting Items *Co-op Rules is just a blurb in the rulebook and NO HOURGLASS (nothing separate like the Kickstarter shows) *5th Player Contamination Cards *Rules after character death + Intruder Player Board and Cards *Alternative Ship Layout on back of the board *5 Special Card Holders (Kickstarter shows different colors, however, they are all grey but numbered 1-5) *1 Additional Combat Die *1 Additional Noise Die *Alternative Intruder Pose 1, 2, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; 3 *(I believe the Action Card and Intruder Attack Card Individual Illustrations; i.e. - I remember all the cards having different art) *Untold Stories #1 + Sheet of Tokens to go with it! My understanding is that this would add Cooperative Campaign. *NO CUSTOM SLIME MARKERS - just clear glass beads (I think this part of the Kickstarter stretch goals changed) *Plastic Fire Tokens Upgrade *Plastic Malfunction Tokens Upgrade Please reference pictures to understand all you are getting. Thanks! Happy to answer any questions you may have! Buyer to pay $25.00 shipping
